description: Try our easy to follow Spicy Baked Lamb With Kale & Crispy Potatoes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Spicy Baked Lamb With Kale & Crispy Potatoes
name: Spicy Baked Lamb With Kale & Crispy Potatoes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place broccolini into a second pan. Drizzle with 2 tsp of the remaining canola oil. Bake for 8 minutes. Meanwhile, strip stems from kale and place into a bowl with remaining canola oil. Massage until softened. Add to pan with broccolini and bake together for a further 8 minutes until wilted.
